entry.title: Come As You Are
entry.summary:
Author: everyonethinkstoomuch

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 62,058Chapters: 26/?Kudos: 126

Summary: 'Bruce was only watching to see how Clark’s sparring was coming along... He wasn’t watching Clark because he liked him or found him attractive. That would be foolish, and not sensible at all, and a distraction from the more important things in life, like beating up criminals every night and passing his exams.'When Clark Kent gets into yet another fight on a night out, his friend Diana suggests he joins the university boxing club to get used to fighting back, without killing someone with his superpowers. Bruce Wayne has just transferred to Metropolis City University and isn’t all too happy about it. Unlike everyone else he knows, he misses Gotham. And now he has to balance university, being Batman, and his feelings for Clark Kent - which he definitely doesn’t have.CONTENT WARNINGS: a little bit of swearing, implied abuse, implied & described mild violence, lots of discussion of dead parents.This is an AU drawing on several different versions of characters and also my own interpretation of them. Bruce is Battinson, Clark is Corensupes & Smallville. The others are a mix of all media types and kind of just what I want them to be!

entry.title: who married professor kent?
entry.summary:
Author: thegonekid

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,279Chapters: 2/5Kudos: 32

Summary: Clark KentProfessor in the ENGLISH DEPARTMENTMETROPOLITAN GOTHAM ACADEMY LIT 229Rating: 2/5 "Professor Kent WILL hijack entire lectures to gush about his husband. Doesn’t matter if we’re supposed to be analyzing Shakespeare—suddenly we’re all trapped listening to how ‘incredible’ his husband looked making pancakes. Apparently, love is real and I’m just failing this class because I couldn’t remember what book his husband bought him for their anniversary. Also, he laughs at his own puns. Loudly. All the time. The man is unstoppable. Someone PLEASE tell me who married this menace because I need to know who willingly signed up for this life."Lois Lane, being the investigative journalist she aspires to be, has to unravel the mystery behind her professor's secret husband.

entry.title: Secret Ingredient
entry.summary:
Author: Lord_Kakarot

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,747Chapters: 1/3Kudos: 1

Summary: Behind closed doors—and occasionally, wide-open windows—the Trinity has been getting a lot closer than you'd expect. Clark Kent may be Earth's greatest hero, but behind that cape is a dominant partner with an indecent streak. Bruce Wayne, Gotham’s brooding knight, is more pliant in private than you'd think. And Diana? Well… let’s just say Olympus never trained her for this kind of bonding.   With sensual tension, intimate teamwork, a lot of suggestive silence from Bruce, with more stuff than a Gotham tabloid, here's the untold tale of the world’s greatest threesome—and one traumatized witness who just wanted to deliver a smoothie.

entry.title: I've Seen This Face Before (I've Seen This Love Before)
entry.summary:
Author: achillesofthesun

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,741Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 84

Summary: Bruce woke up on the roof alone, beams of light piercing through his eyelids. A heat settled over him, the intensity of the light breaking through the cold air of the city skyline. A blanket that he didn’t remember having before is draped over his shoulders. It smells like laundry detergent and Clark Kent. There is a tinge of a floral smell, beyond the chemical detergent, and it doesn’t take the world’s best detective to know it is probably Lois’ perfume.Bruce tears the blanket off of him, and throws it across the roof. A sticky note sits on his forehead. When he peels it off, the residue clings to his skin where it had sat for who knows how long.Had to go to work - call me.Love,Clark--Or: Bruce and Clark date in the early hero days without knowing each other's identities. Time passes, their lives get complicated, and they break up. It is not long until they meet again as Batman and Superman, but Bruce can't shake the familiar pit in his stomach when he looks into Superman's eyes.
